Container.Name: FFmpeg
Container.Overview: A Docker container designed to watch a directory and encode media files.
Container.Description: A Docker container designed to watch a directory and encode media files.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/watch[/b] : set this path to the watch folder[br] [b]/output[/b] : set this path to output folder[br] [b]/copy[/b] : set this path to folder where you wish that original files are copied[br] [b]$output_format[/b] : set new file format for your encoded file[br] [b]$parameters[/b] : define parameters for ffmpeg[br] Parameters are defined like this: ffmpeg -i input_dir/file.avi[br] file.$output_format[br] $parameters[br] They need to be separated by ; as delimiter.
